transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: -king dead! And if you don't open the door and let me in, you're fired.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Well, we're not opening the door. How ya like that?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Good! We didn't want to work here anyway!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey! Hey! (knocks on window) Brak! (knocks again) C'mere, buddy! C'mere.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: It's lemony! And lemony's better than...AGGGHHH!!!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah! We'll call it "Freedom"! I like that.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: But "freedom" rhymes with "We from," like "We from the land of rock!"

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Shut up. Hey! (knocks on glass). Tansut! Hey!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, come over here, buddy. Yeah, open the door. (Tansut walks to the door off-camera) Press, press the blue button.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: But oh boy, do the yellow button!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I said to rock, not to suck! (singing)

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Why don't you just Inviso in there?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, this is what we'll do. (Brak and Tansut start walking toward the door) I will take on the form of steam and enter through the mail slot. Form of steam! Form of steam!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Form of steam. Form of steam. Form of steam. Form of steam.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ya see that? Ya sucked all the lights out!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, I blew the fuse's mind.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eh, let's just make some prank Calls.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm Space Ghost! And welcome to the big show! Tonight--

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: And I'm Tansut. I'll be your director tonight!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, good. Well, I was just--

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Is it bad if a chicken bites you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Then go away from the chicken!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Brak, just shut up and play me to the desk.

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (facing the curtain and muttering to himself.) Then go away from the chicken...

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: I don't know! I'm not in the control room! Unless this is the control room! Is it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs.) Brak, play me to the desk.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: (singing) Where'd he go? I don't know! Where's that Space Ghost? Where'd he go? To the desk!

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: (high-pitched singing.) Da-da-da!! DA DA DAAAAAAAA! DA DA DAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And now the monitor is actually lowering. Tansut?

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: 'Cause I saw them once in a movie...'cause people don't see 'em!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Jon, you ever notice the word "home" appears in a lot of songs?

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: They live on the dinosaur world.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: People always goin' home or comin' home.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: They never write songs about buyin' a home, though, do they? That seems weird to me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Have you seen that show, Jon?

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: The Dr. Katz show, that's the show you're talking about?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, not that show, Jon. The show I'm talking about has skeletal dogs.

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: Oh well, tell me about it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, it's got dog skeletons with the bones that dogs do have. You know, I mean, the ones they own. That are in their body. Under the fur.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, it hasn't aired yet, Jon, but I'm sure that it will.

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: But you obviously haven't seen it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's what I sh...that's what I meant to say when I said I had seen it, is that I want to see it. That's what I should have said.

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: I am not taking calls right now. That's all there is to it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: But it's my phone, Jon. And it's 'ranging'.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: All right. (answers phone) What's your message?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Please! Help me! I am being attacked!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hang up. He'll be here any minute.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: She'd be dead by the time I got there.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You know, from now on, could you call me before the attack? 'Cause otherwise you're just wasting my time.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh no, see, uh, I'm a cable guy.

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: Can you tell her to call back?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: There's some good stuff on right now. And, uh, you oughta be here watchin' it.

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: Is he gonna come back, or is that definitely not...?

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: The guy that was right there.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: I love beans! Wooo woo woo!!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, he's comin' here, so we should probably go there. That works, right?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eh, and crank call him here from over there.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yes! And as he picks up the phone, we'll jump out and kill him with zombies! (laughs as Zorak stares.) What's wrong with that?

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: (singing) I'm gonna strip! I'm gonna take off my clothes! I'm gonna undress! I'm gonna take off my--

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Knock it off! (slams a dissonant chord on the keyboard.) This ain't no Cartoon Planet.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: You coulda just turned it off.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Brak, put your clothes back on.

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: There's nothing wrong with a beautiful body. I'm saying if you have it, you, it's there for a reason. Show it around.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh ho ho, we are so taking that TV.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: These shows sure are something. I'm glad I'm watching them.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (answers.) Space Ghost residence! Space Ghost speaking!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Come back here, to the studio.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Can you hold on a second?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Look, you want your cable cut off?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No! Precious cable! I will give every hair on my body for it!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Then get back to the studio!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I know. Where's my TV?

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (has his shirt off.) The case of the missing TV.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What's wrong with you? (cut to Zorak at Space Ghost's house, talking into the guest monitor.)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What do you mean by that?

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know you're middle-age, and sometimes things settle.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: How dare you say that to me!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Look, man, that's just, uh, very unrealistic.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (speaking on his TV) Viewers of the world! One of you took my television! And I want it back! Tansut, tell me--

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: My navel can hold a quart of bean dip.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, someone stole my TV, and it wasn't me! 'Cause it's mine! You get me?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: And we have many demands that are very unreasonable!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: And disorganized! We have to sort them out and prioritize! 'Cause some of the demands maybe aren't as strong as others, and still others aren't as outrageous so they go in a separate box and the what, uh...from the...uh...

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: You're welcome! No, you're welcome! No, you're welcome!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, Aunt Grabby, here it comes.

transcript.speaker: (A movie preview-style screen pops up with a warning
Announcer
transcript.dialogue: They came from different worlds, then they kidnapped Jon Benjamin and took him to someone's apartment. And that's when they made...Unreasonable Demands!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I want a pet I can love, but I don't want to take care of it!

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Only one thing can stop them, and that thing doesn't exist. Yet.

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: Would you let me go on? I mean, why interrupt?

transcript.speaker: Jon Benjamin
transcript.dialogue: Can I have my sucker back?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: We get it, or he gets it! Or you get it! Ya get it?

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Get it - this Christmas! Unreasonable Commands! This film is not yet rated.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wait a minute! Computer, zoom in.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's the bridge I painted. It's like they filmed this tape recording in an exact replica of my apartment. Wait a minute! They must be in my apartment! But wait a minute...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How'm I gonna get in there?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wait a minute. I have the keys. Perfect!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Maybe what we oughta do, is we die, and then we come back as zombies.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Just give the whole zombie thing a rest, all right?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: But zombies don't rest, see? That's the beauty. They feast on living brains.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I HAVE THE KEYS! IT IS MY APARTMENT!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: IF YOU'RE WATCHING MY CABLE, PLEASE DESCRIBE WHAT'S ON!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: YOU DIDN'T LIST ANY. LOOKS LIKE YOUR MOVIE IS GOING DIRECTLY TO VIDEO. VIDEO PRISON!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh yeah? Well, we're sending Benjamin out in pieces!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: THAT'LL BE FINE. JUST DON'T TOUCH MY TV, OKAY? OR YOU'RE --KING DEAD! (CLEARS THROAT) SO, UH, WHAT ARE YOU ALL WATCHING?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hang on. It's, it's on, but we're not watching it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: YOU'RE WASTING IT! I'M COMING IN!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hmm. These aren't my lamps. These have feet. This must not be my apartment.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'd better go get a new apartment.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm not going to let them get me. I'm not. I'm not gonna let them get me.
